summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4270 for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, Sound View Addition to Queen Anne, being the alley from West Halladay Street to West Ray Street, between 9th Avenue West and 10th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50793, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
